thread.title: Watch tech hedge fund manager Palihapitiya reveal his latest play

author: Thomas Franck
title: Watch tech hedge fund manager Palihapitiya reveal his latest play
text:
Watch tech hedge fund manager and former Facebook exec Palihapitiya reveal his latest play 16 Mins Ago Breaking News 
[The stream is slated to start at 1:05 p.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.] 
Social Capital founder Chamath Palihapitiya reveals his latest investment move from the Sohn Conference in New York. 
Sohn is one of the most widely anticipated hedge fund events the year, where managers volunteer their time and best investment ideas to raise money in the fight against childhood cancer. This year, the conference began with Next Wave Sohn, featuring the "next generation of talent" among hedge fund managers.
